title: murugan nAmam
sahitya:
murugan nAmam karudiDu manamE oru muraiyEnum dinamum nI


anupallavi

  parama sukham peravum pAril sirappuravum


caraNam    tiruvEragham uraivOn dInarukk-aruL purivOn karuNaikkOr uruvAga tiruk-kATSo taruvOn
parivuDanE bhaktarai bhAvittE varuvOn pAril tanakku iNai vErinri sirakkum
